title: CSS Colors & Typography Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of CSS color formats and typography properties

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a valid CSS color format?
questions.explanation: There's no color() syntax — CSS uses named colors or numeric systems like RGB and HSL.

questions.question: What does the A stand for in RGBA?
questions.explanation: It controls opacity — 1 is fully opaque, 0 is fully transparent.

questions.question: Which Google Fonts import method is correct?
questions.explanation: You link Google Fonts via the <link> element inside the <head>.

questions.question: Why should you include multiple font names in a font-family list?
choices: It allows browser to choose the best style
It provides fallback fonts if one fails to load
questions.explanation: Fallback fonts ensure text still displays properly if the preferred font isn't available.

questions.question: What property adjusts the vertical spacing between lines of text?
questions.explanation: It makes paragraphs easier to read by controlling space between lines.
